sentences.en: The White House is eager to protect and enhance that reputation.
sentences.cn: 白宫急于保护并提高那声望。

sentences.en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms.
sentences.cn: 大幅画作能增加小房间的宽敞感。

sentences.en: This is an opportunity to enhance the reputation of the company.
sentences.cn: 这是提高公司声誉的机会。
